text:
<@U0387DA68RY> I think this has something to do with the fact that you are not fetching an `items`. Try adding some deal properties to fetch, and it seems to be working. We will look into this more

```query MyQuery {
  CRM {
    deal_collection {
      total
      items {
        amount
      }
    }
  }
}```
We are working on a fix for this! But the workaround I mentioned should work for now
Awesome! Specifically blog data would be nice to have.
Awesome, it is on the roadmap! Would you expect all custom module data in blog posts to be available in GraphQL? Or just the standard blog properties like slug, post body, featured image, etc.?
